title: The time for my friends' games are incorrect.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Every time I hover over a friend in game on the new client, they always show they are 100+ minutes into the game.

replies.body: Your PC clock may be out of sync in this case.  Make sure your OS' time is correct, and that should fix it up!  Let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=07mQE25X,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-30T20:28:14.750+0000)
>
> Your PC clock may be out of sync in this case.  Make sure your OS' time is correct, and that should fix it up!  Let me know if that helps.

Yes that fixed it thanks for the help
